definition: breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
to settle (a dispute)/to quieten down/to suppress
(of a bird) to perch/(of creatures in general) to inhabit/to dwell

sentences.english: Only the patient has a slice of hope, doctor has the responsibility to save him.
sentences.chinese: 只要病人还有一息生机，医生就有挽救。

sentences.english: Doctors are due to save a patient's life as long as he has a slim chance of survival.
sentences.chinese: 只要病人还有一息生机，医生就有责任挽救。

sentences.english: As long as the patient still has one chance of survival, the doctor is resposible to save him.
sentences.chinese: 只要病人还有一息生机，医生就有责任挽救。

sentences.english: Thus this entire mass of suffering ceases.
He fought till his last breath.
sentences.chinese: 他一直奋斗到生命的最后一息。

sentences.english: I must sit down and rest I'm tired out.
sentences.chinese: 我一定得坐下息一息，我累设了。

sentences.english: Oceans apart day after day , any i slowly go insane.
sentences.chinese: 海洋日覆一日的汹涌卟息，我慢慢地变疯狂。

sentences.english: Doctors have the responsibilities to save the patient even when there is just a piece of hope .
sentences.chinese: 只要病人还有一息生机，医生就有责任挽救。

sentences.english: Compared with the control unit, the arithmetic logic unit accepts the command of the control unit to carry through action.
sentences.chinese: 取控造器比拟，运算器接收节制器的命令进举动息。

sentences.english: Interest has been generally reduced in Anhua, and there have been reductions in other counties, too.
sentences.chinese: 安化已普遍地减了息，他县亦有减息的事。

sentences.english: To a People's Hospital inspection, discovered in oneself rest the strange nephritis.
sentences.chinese: 到人民医院一检查，发现自己息上了怪性肾炎。

sentences.english: And Simon encamped against Bethsura, and assaulted it many days, and shut them up.
sentences.chinese: 息孟在贝特族尔对面扎营，攻打了多日，将那地封锁。

sentences.english: But Simon pitched in Addus, over against the plain.
sentences.chinese: 那时，息孟在平原对面的哈狄得扎营。

sentences.english: as long as patients have one breath , doctors have responbilities to save patients
sentences.chinese: 只要病人还有一息生机，医生就有责任挽救。

sentences.english: Thorough elimination of adhesion between friction plate and armature after stopping for long time.
sentences.chinese: 完美解决长期停运状态下摩擦息与衔铁的粘黏现象。

sentences.english: A cold, low whistle; accompanies my last breath; wind in sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 寥落乎馀响，尚存一息随之逝，悲风共凄凉。

definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
variant of 氣|气[qi4], breath/air/steam/gas/weather/used in Taoist charms
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
